targets.query: SELECT count("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT count("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "type"
targets.rawSql: SELECT count("distance"), type FROM "activities" WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY type;

targets.query: SELECT "distance", "duration" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "distance", "duration", "time" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT "distance" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "distance", time FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "duration", time FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
SELECT "distance" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time)

targets.query: SELECT "distance" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "distance" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT "elevation" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "elevation" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT "max_speed" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);
targets.rawSql: SELECT "max_speed" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time) AND max_speed < 130;
SELECT "max_watts" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);

targets.query: SELECT min("prtime") as time FROM "segments" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
targets.rawSql: SELECT min("prtime") as time FROM "segments" WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY "name"

targets.query: SELECT sum("distance") FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);  GROUP BY "year"
targets.rawSql: SELECT sum("distance"), year FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY "year" ORDER BY "year";

targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum("distance") as distance, cumulative_sum("elevation") as elevation FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);  GROUP BY "year"
SELECT cumulative_sum("duration") as "duration" FROM "activities" WHERE type in ($type) AND $__timeFilter(time);  GROUP BY "year"
